$AAPL  unless warren buffet unloads there is no way it is going below 150. There is going to be big buys from hedgefunds, buybacks from apple and Berkshire soon. The stock is undervalued. I’m a too bearish on the market, but Apple is kind of both technical, fundament and sentimental to American economy. So I’m bullish on them to get to 3T$ this year

$AAPL And now the futures move up, Whatta fuckin joke. It's not fooling me. This Motha Fucka spikes in the morning, I'm cutting it loose. At this rate I can buy back Friday in the 150s. Fuck you manipulaters.

body:
$AAPL what price target did Bank of America give Apple? @JimCramer loves to say buy Apple don't trade it but he has been radio silent.🤐

Down three days on a row and covered with a very bearish social media tone. $MSFT was down after hours now up. 

Tomorrow will be an  interesting day and will determine the pre earnings move. Turn around Wednesday? We shall see.

Reports next week.
$AAPL idiot . Blocked

message.body: $AAPL likely the last time we'll ever see 165 on Apple. I'm playing the 130 puts for March, should see roughly a 60-70% correction in growth as 8 rate hikes are priced and the 10 year approached 5.00

Is it too controversial to say the Fed is scum?  If you reply yes, that’s fine.  But it doesn’t change my mind.  “We’re going to control inflation” is 💯% crap, in my opinion.  They wanted the selloff, they’re getting the selloff.  The only reason the Fed exists is to control the stock market.  If you disagree with me, that’s fine but keep in mind that I disagree with you and I will continue to disagree with you.

I disclose all my positions clearly listed on the page, and I do not trade my account on the stocks spoken of in this column unless fully disclosed.

body:
$SPY $MRNA $TSLA $AAPL $NVDA 

My thoughts on the mkt  ... 

First off, from the very start of 2022 I told my members that we would have one more push to 480 and then a 10%+ correction would happen this half of the year. I even posted here on ST (SEE BELOW). 

Ever since, my members have gotten the same message from me all the way down - sell the rallies! Each week I put out a Game Plan for the Week. Each day I give stk/tech analysis alerts and commentary. My members have gotten a clear path from 480  to 450. 

There are a lot of young investors out there that have been absolutely destroyed because they have known only one thing - "buy the dip". And they have done so in high multiple names that will never get back to their highs. 

My advice? Do not let a single trade ruin your gains/account. Take losses. Manage risk!

The days of super high multiples is ending. Where will stocks like  MRNA, TSLA, AAPL, NVDA bottom? If interested in joining, email me at

 jessielivermore1929@gmail.com
